input.sentences: this is a picture of a bike .
this is a picture of a a group of bikers .
this is a picture of two bikers .
this is a picture of two men .
this is a picture of the winning bikers .
output.sentences: The winner's bike was perched on the stage for onlookers to take a picture.
Many people in the crowd rushed to get close to take a picture of the bikers.
One spectator captured a great picture of two bikers having a chat after the race.
Some even got a picture of behind the scenes action.
Some people in the crowd got a great picture of the men as they raised their arms and celebrated winning the race.
